meanings.definition: A skirt worn over another skirt or dress.
meanings.sent1: She added an overskirt to her dress for extra flair.
meanings.sent2: The bride wore a beautiful overskirt over her gown.
meanings.sent3: The overskirt twirled gracefully as she danced at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her overskirt was like a flowing waterfall of fabric.
meanings.sent5: The overskirt made her outfit look elegant and sophisticated.

meanings.sent1: She decided to overskirt her dress for the special occasion.
meanings.sent2: I will overskirt this outfit to make it more stylish.
meanings.sent3: He overskirted his costume and stood out at the event.
meanings.sent4: She overskirted with confidence and grace.
meanings.sent5: Overskirting her attire transformed it into a fashion statement.
